## PopulatableEthersLiquity.send1USD() method

Send 1USD tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
send1USD(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedEthersLiquityTransaction<void>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                     | Description             |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------- |
| toAddress | string                                                                   | Address of receipient.  |
| amount    | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)                                   | Amount of 1USD to send. |
| overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |                         |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedEthersLiquityTransaction](./lib-ethers.populatedethersliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;void&gt;&gt;
